import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { AcceptDenyContainer } from "./AcceptDenyContainer.js" import "./Requests.css" export const Requests = () => { const [requests, setRequest] = useState([]) //const [refresh, setRefresh] = useState(true) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect( () => { fetch(`http://localhost:8088/requests?_expand=genre&_sort=startDate`) .then(response => response.json()) .then((requestInfo) => { setRequest(requestInfo) }) }, [] ) return (<>
{requests.length ?

Studio Requests

{requests.map(request => { return (<>
Band Name: {request.bandName}
Phone Number: {request.phoneNumber}
Start Date: {request.startDate}
End Date: {request.endDate}
No. of Songs: {request.numOfSongs}
Genre: {request?.genre?.type}
Musicians: {request.musicianRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Session Musicians: {request.sessionMusicians === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Photos: {request.photoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Video Request: {request.videoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}




) })}
:
FatBack currently has no booking requests.
}
{ navigate("/futurebookings") }}>

See your future bookings

) } //Add in a place to write notes about the session for planning or saying how it went
